titleStmt.title: A solemn testimony against toleration and the present proceedings of sectaries and their abettors in England in reference to religion and government, with an admonition and exhortation to their brethren there from the Commissioners of the General Assembly of the Kirk of Scotland. Together with the return of the honourable Estates of Parliament upon the said testimony communicated to them, and their concurrence with the same.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Ker, A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, print show-through with some loss of text.
